name: Run Dummy Run
description:
Run Dummy Run is a classic 2D runner with a side view.

You control a crash test doll. The doll was very scared when she found out what it was created for and decided to run.

Test your reaction, make the doll jump in time and overcome obstacles and enemies. On the levels you can find special perks that change the gameplay, for example, speeding up the character, or you can ride a chicken and fly on it, turn upside down taking anti-gravity boots.
